attributes.action: Remove Tissue from the AQA Power and Conflict, English Literature GCSE course
attributes.background: Tissue is the most hated poem in the AQA course for poetry. Rarely any students understand it’s meaning which is bad as if it came up, few could answer it. I believe it should be removed because of it’s insane difficulty and as there are no higher and foundation papers for English should be removed.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of AQA and not the UK Government or Parliament.
